page.title: 16INDUSTRY IN THE AIRE VALLEY
page.content: INDUSTRY IN THE AIRE VALLEY HAS ALONG HISTORY.THE MONKS OF KIRKSTALL ABBEY MOST LIKELY INITIATED "KIRKSTALL FORGE",WHICH IS STILL A MAJOR SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.THE MONASTERY ALSO BROUGHT ABOUT THE ASSOCIATION OF THIS AREAWITH THE WOLLEN TRADE.LATER,ANUMBER OF WOLLEN MILLS WERE ESTABLISHED ALONG THE EDGE OF THE FAST FLOWING RIVER AIRE.ONE OF THESE OLD MILLS WAS RECENTLY DEMOLISHED.OTHERS HAVE BEEN REDEVELOPED TO PROVIDE SUITABLE PREMISES FOR NEWER LIGHT INDUSTRIES(SEE EXAMPLE NEXT PAGE).QUARRYING WAS ALSO IMPORTANT IN THE 19TH CENTURY,BUT SUBSTANTIAL QUARRIES ON EITHER SIDE OF THE VALLEY HAVE LONG SINCE CLOSED AND LIE DERELICT.SOME TRADITIONAL INDUSTRIES DO,HOWEVER STILL REMAIN IN THE AREA. (SEE NEXT PAGE)
